content.text: Thank you, you too! How is your week going so far?
So far so good! I'm looking forward to a relaxing weekend.
That's great to hear! I'm looking forward to spending more time with my wife and comics.
What kind of comics do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of comics, but I especially enjoy superhero comics and graphic novels.
I love superhero comics too! I'm a big fan of Marvel and DC Comics.
Me too! I'm also a fan of indie comics.
I've never read any indie comics. What are some of your favorites?
My favorite indie comics are Saga, The Walking Dead, and The Sandman.
I've heard good things about Saga and The Walking Dead. I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're both great comics.
